alert.note: Alert for Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:33PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ulster County through 615 PM EDT... At 533 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Woodland Valley Campground, or 18 miles northeast of Liberty, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodland Valley Campground, West Hurley, West Shokan, Kenneth L Wilson Campground, Mount Tremper, Phoenicia, Shandaken, Denning, Ashokan, Glenford, Big Indian, Oliverea, Chichester, Woodland, Allaben, Montoma, Branch, Seager, Pine Hill and Boiceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
